changeSet.sql:
create table ${schemaName}.movements ( id bigserial, patient_id bigint, company_id bigint, sector_id bigint, stock_id bigint,
constraint pk_movements primary key(id), constraint fk_patients foreign key(patient_id) references ${schemaName}.patients(id), constraint fk_companies foreign key(company_id) references ${schemaName}.companies(id), constraint fk_sectors foreign key(sector_id) references ${schemaName}.sectors(id), constraint fk_stocks foreign key(stock_id) references ${schemaName}.stocks(id) );
